main event: On November 1, 1961, a witness observed an unidentified object in the sky which appeared similar to the Echo satellite.
interesting points: The object was reported to be moving in a northerly direction and disappeared suddenly after several minutes of observation., The object was described as being brighter than the stars., The witness received a phone call from a neighbor who also observed the same object., The object was seen at an elevation of 70 to 80 degrees above the horizon., The sighting lasted approximately 5-8 minutes.
sighted object: an object similar to the Echo satellite
witness description: One witness was a 32-year-old male, professional engineer, and the other address details were redacted.
